faq-urs-znPgp2l0.q: Does Ursafar gain coins for removing a minion on his Primary Red?
faq-urs-znPgp2l0.a: No. Coins are only gained for defeating a Minion, not Removing one.

faq-urs-ZpV2cmhu.q: Would Ursafar’s Ultimate (Unbound Fury) allow him to move using his Silver (Angry Roar)?
faq-urs-ZpV2cmhu.a: No. The second effect on Angry Roar, +2 Movement, will only increase the Movement value of a card which already has a Movement Action.

faq-urs-z0mVe4p1.q: Does the additional movement only applied to the card it is printed on?
faq-urs-z0mVe4p1.a: Yes. When Ursafar is enraged, his blue allows him to move further with that explicit action. It does not apply to any other cards (there is no “**This round**” indication).
